name: Abyss: fairytail feathers
description:
Abyss: fairytail feathers - This is Action-RPG, a game that has not forgotten about dialogues, exploring the world and quiet moments.

The game consists of tasks, the main character is not an adventurer, builder, soldier, that is, those whose target can be quickly identified. He will have different situations on his way, now he is a boy from a shelter and how to achieve the desired if you are "kicked" in the wrong direction where you would like to be.

If he's hungry, he'll go and earn his money for food. If he wanted a roof over his head, his methods of earning money won't give him all the options. The choice of character will be prescribed in advance, but will not your choice consist of one option if you are a little boy from an orphanage or a teenager who stole a couple of coins and now has a knife at the throat and the owner of the knife offers one way out. The game will be tasks in the background the result of which can change the course of the game but this does not mean that the game will be a choice that will lead to different endings, the end will be one.

What is 1\3 demo?

It is the first of 3 parts of the demo version, it is linear and shows the mechanics that will be used in the future. This is not the final form of the game. Exactly one thing we can say we will try to get off the linear narrative and open access to possible bugs that may affect the story. After all, if you do not perform secondary missions, you can skip new acquaintances that may have helped one way or another.

I'll be stuck in the game without knowing where to go?

The first mission is to get a "diary" which is used as an inventory menu in which everything you need to know, such as current tasks, completed tasks, inventory items, character statistics. 

The gaming process:

- Action adventure with rpg elements.

- Introduction to the world and progress of quests.

- Gain experience with quests.

- Adventure: Exploring villages, towns, and surrounding areas through missions and outside tasks.

- Hack and slash (Tasks that will meet in the story as in free research)

Works on Unity.

- Performing secondary missions.
